name: Boozers Losers
description:
This is a little party game where you throw vodka at your friends. When you're out of alcohol refill your ammo at the bar. Use items to recover or give yourself a boost. 

And remember: too much booze and you lose!

Play locally on your keyboard and if you have a controller even a third player can join in.

Move - WASD, Arrow Keys, Left Joy Stick

Shoot - Space, Enter, East Controller Button

Credits:

Celina Rosenberg - Art and Programming

Laura Rangel Guerra - Character Design

Halid Osmaev - Programmer

Artuna Doganay - Programmer

Special Thanks to Lena Charchan for the idea

Music by SoundCarousel from Pixabay
